website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for socks to hit the slopes with a reputation for durability, comfortable fit, and serious warmth, you'll be thrilled that you get 2 pair for one affordable price.
pros: Wool/acrylic blend combined with shin protection and padded soles make this pack of 2 both warm and comfortable on top of being a good value
cons: Consumers with longer legs may find them shorter than expected
A bit thick, but also very warm

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: These socks are long enough to fit well up toward my knees. The support fibers woven into the foot provide a nice tight feel around the instep without crunching my toes. Haven't had really cold weather yet, but they seem warm. They breathe well also.
customer_reviews.author: David Mellor

customer_reviews.title: Best thermal socks I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best thermal socks I have found. I bought this before last winter. I wore those 2 pairs all winter along with Fox River liners. They keep my feet toasty warm, are extremely comfortable, and really last. I still have the original 2 pairs and bought 4 more with liners to accompany them this winter. I wear them almost every day all winter long whether I'm in my Abedo shoes for work or my muck boots around the house.
customer_reviews.author: J.F. in VA

customer_reviews.title: Truly warm socks!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these socks!! I wear them indoors around the house 3 seasons. Warm feet-aaaaahh! I also downhill ski & buy Fox River ski socks exclusively. I like their products & selection much better than other brands. (In addition, they have- -wait for it- -MONKEY SOCKS!!!! Yes, they offer Rockford socks for making the ever-popular Sock Monkey!)
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great wool socks
customer_reviews.text: These are great knit socks that stay up on the calf, not in a pile around your ankles. They are holding their shape through numerous washer & dryer cycles.
customer_reviews.author: FunkyC.

customer_reviews.title: Way too thin
customer_reviews.text: The photos look good but the socks are very thin and don't keep you warm, like you'd think a Merino wool sock should.
customer_reviews.author: martinJ

customer_reviews.title: FoxRiver Snow Pack Over-The-Calf Merino Wool Socks
customer_reviews.text: very good quality nice and warm and they stay up - excellent and I will get more
customer_reviews.author: L. reed

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than name brand
customer_reviews.text: Works better than UA and cost much less. Mom Did good again
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: fox river are the best socks i have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: fox river are the best socks i have ever worn .. i bought some 20 years ago and still have them .. i wore them in the winter to help keep my feet warm at work and now they don't stay up .. so i have been trying some new ones
customer_reviews.author: Macguy

customer_reviews.title: Warm long socks
customer_reviews.text: I wanted them longer than the normal sock, which they are and they are very warm, not too thick for a boot, but thick enough to keep warm outside.
customer_reviews.author: cinderella

customer_reviews.title: Watch for Falling Socks!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are think and add cushioning but they do NOT stay up. They fell around my ankles within minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Cope

customer_reviews.title: Snug and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love them! So soft and cozy. I feel like my foot is actually protected. My feel feel warm and nice. Great for colder weather
customer_reviews.author: Silvia S

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the socks to come up higher on the calf, a little disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Myra Smith

customer_reviews.title: He  liked these the best.
customer_reviews.text: He loves them. I bought a quantity of brands for him and returned the ones he didn't want. These are the ones he picked as soft, comfortable and warm. I don't know if it makes a difference, but his feet are a size 7.5 EE with a super high instep.
customer_reviews.author: Yeshua Ronia

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: The socks are comfortable and warm but fit JUST above the calf and could use some additional elastic to help keep them up. I find myself pulling them up quite often.
customer_reviews.author: detonator

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: Warm no sweat and comfy Update on my 4th pair I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Tonythetiger

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these on my trip to Iceland and the were so comfortable and kept my feet nice and warm. I've very happy with this purchase and will buy more if needed for any future trips to the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Wenzel

customer_reviews.title: Great socks!
customer_reviews.text: Great socks !!! Not too thick and not too light, just perfect. Actually bought 2nd pair after getting my 1st order. Would buy again😁
customer_reviews.author: mattew savadel

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: Kept my feet warm and didn't slide down for my first skiing trip in 20 years
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Just what my man needed for winter walks with the dog. He loves them. Perfect fit. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ann Hasche

customer_reviews.title: The Hubby LOVES these socks!
customer_reviews.text: The Hubby LOVES these socks. They fit his huge feet and cover his calves completely. He said he'd take a new pack every year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wash great with no pilling
customer_reviews.text: Loved these on our winter vacation in northern Manitoba. Soft and comfortable inside my boots. Wash great with no pilling.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm!
customer_reviews.text: My standard crew socks were giving me chafing issues. Plus they were thin and were not very warm. These Fox River socks are awesome. They're comfortable, didn't creep down my leg, and kept my feet nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Wu

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: Tries one pair and they were very comfortable. Not much more to say.
customer_reviews.author: Collectorholic

customer_reviews.title: Socks with reach and capacity
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly warm for thickness, nice and long reaching above the calves, and so far wearing well. The heels and toes should hold out. Overall a great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon G. Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and warm. Holds up to rugged daily use and constant washing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm but did not feel like high quality or super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Socks were ok. Warm but did not feel like high quality or super comfortable. They started feeling loose after a while and did not remain firm.
customer_reviews.author: sandesh kataria

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these to wear with ski boots, they ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to wear with ski boots, they ran somewhat small and the material was thicker than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Not over-the-calf
customer_reviews.text: These socks are not over-the-calf. The only come up to me my mid calf. I have a size 15B foot. However I decided to keep them because of the thickness and warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey K. Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Haven't worn them yet but I expect they'll be perfect for cold weather in Wisconsin.
customer_reviews.author: Carla K. Alm

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: Overall good value for the price, but I wish the socks would have been longer and fully covered the calf.
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: not warm
customer_reviews.text: wearing these around the house with no slippers and sleeping in them at night did not keep my feet even a bit warm. my feet were still cold. had to add another pair of socks over to get some warmth. heat holders are still the warmest most thick socks ive found so far. if anyone can suggest something warmer than those please leave in comments. thanks
customer_reviews.author: geneveve

customer_reviews.title: Socks are good but too tight
customer_reviews.text: These are good socks, but they are too tight. The portion of the sock that goes around the foot feels great but getting the socks totally on is a bitch. The diameter of the sock around the leg is way to small and tight. They are similar to support hose. Add some diametric material into that zone and the socks will be class A. When I get dressed in the morning I'm cabby enough without needing to put on a pair of socks that I need to wrestle with. I'm a slim person. I do not have large legs. I'm 5' 10" tall at 140 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pleban

product_meta.title: FoxRiver Snow Pack Over-The-Calf Merino Wool Socks (2 Pack)
product_meta.description: These otc snow and ski socks have insulating fibers, gentle compression and moisture wicking to keep your feet warm and dry. Featuring a cushioned sole and shin protection from bumps and bruises. Proudly made in the USA, these cold weather medium weight socks include a spandex ANKLE panel to hold sock comfortably in place, a smooth and flat toe seam that adds comfort and durability, fully thermalined leg and foot to absorb shocks and insulate. Most importantly of all these over-the-calf socks are carefully made with a Merino wool and acrylic blend that are proven to move moisture away from skin. You won't find a better 2-pack pair of winter socks!
feature_bullets: A special, fine grade of wool that shares all of the characteristics of classic wool such as thermoregulation, breathability and odor control. It's also luxuriously soft & comfortable.
Lightweight jersey knitting at instep helps eliminate bunching and bulk at the ankle
Smooth, flat toe seam doesn't rub or irritate during wear. Plus, our smooth, flat toe closure technique adds durability so it stretches every way you do without unraveling
FoxSox are against manufacturing defects for one year
